directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes, then add all drink ingredients and shake well to dissolve sugar. Strain into a Martini glass.
ingredients: 1 1/2 oz (3 tablespoons) bourbon or blended whiskey
1 1/2 oz (3 tablespoons) pure pomegranate juice such as POM Wonderful
Garnish: fresh pomegranate seeds or a maraschino cherry
title: Pomegranate Manhattan
